column15:
Use #T8_raven
when sharing tech about this character
on Twitter

column2:
1. Additional follow-up to some Doppelganger moves
2. Doppelgangers regen meter on hit and are safer
3. Additional follow for his f,f,f+3 move

column6: _Quick jab to start offense and check situations
_The first hit can be used to enter Back turned stance
_Poke string with a counterhit launching follow-up
_Pressure move that shifts to SZN stance
_Safe long range attack that can go into SZN

column3: Escapes any attacks but RAGE ART

column6: _A safe counterhit launcher from crouching position
_Big low that enables his full crouch mixup game
